items.sentence: Don\'t you understand what\'s happening here?
Teach Tom how to introduce himself in French.
Thanks for telling me what needed to be done.
Do you still think that\'s all we need to do?
We\'ll eat our dinner in the kitchen tonight.
Tom has a reputation for being a good worker.
Tom has a wife and a three-year-old daughter.
Tom has asked us to buy him something to eat.
Tom has been asked to sing a couple of songs.
Tom has been diagnosed with bipolar disorder.
Tom isn\'t the smartest student in the class.
Tom just announced he\'d be moving to Boston.
It certainly wasn\'t easy to get Tom to help.
Let\'s go for a walk in the park after lunch.
I think we all should have been more careful.
I think you should buy yourself a new ladder.
Nobody wants others to think they\'re stupid.
Are you sure that you want to give this away?
I\'m afraid you\'re going to have to do that.
I\'m assuming you haven\'t talked to Tom yet.
